txt.en: While battling against the forces in Tarlang's Crown, you have encountered the Ruthless Dead. Rallied to the side of the Dark Lord by Azruthor, an Heir of Castamir, these cursed Men strike fear into the hearts of any that look upon them.\n\nAlthough they may never be brought to rest, they must be banished from the Crown back into their darkened paths under the mountain.
Drawn to Tarlang's Crown by Azruthor, the Ruthless Dead continue to strike fear into the enemies of the Heirs of Castamir.
You have defeated many Dead in Tarlang's Crown.
The Umbarrim in Tarlang's Crown enjoy the strength of the Black Númenóreans, a line long-assumed to have vanished from Middle-earth.
The Dead can be found throughout Tarlang's Crown.\n\nYou have encountered the Dead and should defeat them to free the Crown of their terror.
Defeated the Dead in Tarlang's Crown ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have defeated many of the Dead in Tarlang's Crown. They may never truly find rest under the Heirs of Castamir, but you have done well to purge the Crown of their frightful forms.
Defeat the Dead in Tarlang's Crown ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
